text: tatha unake (garv se) kahane ke kaaran ki hamane allaah ke rasool, maryam ke putr, eesa maseehî€¼ ko vadh kar diya, jabaki (vaastav mein) use vadh nahin kiya aur na saleeb (phaansee) dee, parantu unake lie (ise) sandigdh kar diya gaya. nihsandeh, jin logon ne isamen vibhed kiya, ve bhee shanka mein pade hue hain aur unhen isaka koee gyaan nahin, keval anumaan ke peechhe pade hue hain aur nishchay use unhonne vadh nahin kiya hai
